mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member_t WHERE (mName=#{mName} and email=#{email}) OR (memberID=#{memberID} and mName=#{mName} and email=#{email})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_t ( memberID, memberPW, mName, nickname, gender, birth, enrollDate, phone1, phone2, phone3, email, mLevel, proSaveName, enabled ) VALUES ( #{memberID}, #{memberPW}, #{mName}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birth}, SYSDATE, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email}, #{mLevel}, #{proSaveName}, #{enabled} )
